# Introduction
In this analysis, we will analyze changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population for Cambodia over time. We will use python to analyze the data and visualize the results.

# Data Loading
```{python}
#| echo: true
#| label: country-analysis
#| message: false

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Load the Gapminder dataset
gapminder = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

# Filter the dataset for Cambodia
cambodia_data = gapminder[gapminder["country"] == "Cambodia"]
```

# Graphing
```{python}
#| echo: true
#| label: graph-life-country
#| message: false


# ---- Life Expectancy Over Time ----
plt.figure()
plt.plot(cambodia_data["year"], cambodia_data["life_expectancy"]) 
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Cambodia: Life Expectancy Over Time")
plt.show()
```


```{python}
#| echo: true
#| label: graph-gdp-country
#| message: false


# ---- GDP per Capita Over Time ----
plt.figure()
plt.plot(cambodia_data["year"], cambodia_data["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.title("Cambodia: GDP per Capita Over Time")
plt.show()
```


```{python}
#| echo: true
#| label: graph-pop-country
#| message: false


# ---- Population Over Time ----
plt.figure()
plt.plot(cambodia_data["year"], cambodia_data["population_millions"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Population")
plt.title("Cambodia: Population Over Time")
plt.show()
```
